name: California Tacos
author: WHIRLEDPEAS
summary: These tacos are full of fresh vegetables and lime. They're quick and easy to make and they manage to be both healthy and very budget-friendly!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 dash green pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Mix tomatoes, avocados, onion, 1/4 cup cilantro, and garlic together in a bowl
Drizzle lime juice over tomato mixture; toss to coat
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat
Arrange tortillas, 2 at a time, in hot oil; cook until crisp, about 1 minute per side
Remove tortillas using tongs and repeat with remaining tortillas
Spoon 2 tablespoons black beans and 2 tablespoons cooked rice onto each crisp tortilla; top with tomato mixture
Garnish tacos using remaining 2 tablespoons cilantro and green pepper sauce
